review: This is the first time I write a review because this is the first time that I felt so disappointed to Amazon. It worked well for first 2 months, after then it couldn't stream anything except commercials. At the first, I thought it was hulu+'s problem, and what I found was hulu works good on my computer. Though, prime movie even cannot be streamed on the box. The worst thing is I don't even know where to contact to get a solution for it. SUPER DISAPPOINTED!!!
author: HuiziQian

review: Amazon Fire TV offers many options for TV programs and movie viewing; at this time it appears to have been a good purchase. I have not had the time to go through all of the programs and options that are available. The one thing that stands out is that some things are free and some are paid. You just can't push the button and think it is free.Believe it or not, there are some commercials.  One reason for getting Fire TV was to get away from stupid commercials. They say there is 1 free month of Amazon Prime but no indication of the starting date.  Is it the day you installed  and registered the program or when you actually try to get a free Amazon program.  Other then that, it seems fine.
author: Franco Cisco "Franco Cisco"
